title: Bakers Delight - Ferntree Plaza
description: Bakery with multiple outlets, offering numerous savory and sweet vegan items. Products that are vegan suitable are notated on its website. In store a till docket can be requested for each product that lists the ingredients as well as "suitable for vegans" if that is the case.
streetAddress: Shop 6, Ferntree Plaza Shopping Centre, Burwood Hwy
